title: Leadership Competency Enhancement: Social Learning-Based Capacity Building for Freshwater Management

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze stakeholder conflicts in freshwater management settings using a social learning framework
Learners can assess the influence between organizational institutional practices and social learning processes using participatory reflection techniques
Learners can perform collaborative decision-making in virtual freshwater management scenarios using smartphone-based tools (surveys, videos, chat)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
